CustomField.formula: IF( Case__r.Number_of_Items__c > 1 , IMAGE("/resource/1501716834000/Credit_Approval_Alert_Case", "There is more than one credit approval requests on this case"), 'This Credit Approval does not have more Approvals')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This case may have other credit approvals which you need to be aware of before approving this credit.
CustomField.label: Attention
